data.enText: covering a large area; great in amount

data.chText: 这栋房子有宽敞的庭院。
火灾造成了巨大的损失。

data.enText: She suffered extensive injuries in the accident.

data.chText: 大规模的修缮工作正在进行。
data.enText: Extensive repair work is being carried out.
including or dealing with a wide range of information

data.chText: 对这种疾病已进行了广泛研究。
data.enText: Extensive research has been done into this disease.
His knowledge of music is extensive.

data.chText: 东方烹饪广泛使用的香料
data.enText: a spice used extensively in Eastern cooking

simple_means.memory_skill: ex 出 + tens 伸展 + ive 有…性质的 → 可四处伸展的 → 广泛的

example: a panoptic study of Soviet nationality"- T.G.Winne

tr: large in spatial extent or range or scope or quantity
example: an extensive Roman settlement in northwest England

tr: increasing productivity by using large areas with minimal outlay and labor

value.def: Something that is extensive covers or includes a large physical area.

example.ex: When built, the palace and its grounds were more extensive than the city itself.
example.tran: 建成时，宫殿及其庭园比城市本身面积还要大。

example.ex: Mark, however, needs to travel extensively with his varied business interests.
example.tran: 然而，马克因为各种生意需要频繁出差。

value.def: Something that is extensive covers a wide range of details, ideas, or items.

example.ex: Developments in South Africa receive extensive coverage in The Sunday Telegraph...
example.tran: 《星期日电讯报》全面报道了南非的发展。

example.ex: ...the extensive research into public attitudes to science...
example.tran: 针对公众科学观的广泛调查

example.ex: The facilities available are very extensive.

value.tran: 广泛的;全面的;包罗万象的

example.ex: All these issues have been extensively researched in recent years.
example.tran: 近年来，对所有这些问题都作了全面研究。

value.def: If something is extensive, it is very great.

example.ex: The blast caused extensive damage, shattering the ground-floor windows...
example.tran: 爆炸造成了巨大的破坏，震碎了一楼的窗户。

example.ex: The security forces have extensive powers of search and arrest...
example.tran: 安全部队拥有搜查和逮捕的至高权力。

example.ex: Mr Marr makes extensive use of exclusively Scottish words.
example.tran: 马尔先生使用了大量苏格兰特有的词汇。

example.ex: Hydrogen is used extensively in industry for the production of ammonia.
example.tran: 氢气在工业上广泛用于制氨。

trans: 广泛应用；行李捆绑带用途广泛
泛读；广泛阅读；拓展阅读；泛读课；英语泛读
广种；扩大面积耕种；粗放耕作（栽培）

partsOfSpeech.dec: at 加强 + tend 伸展 → 延伸〔服务〕→ 看护
attend 出席；看护 + ant …的，具有…性质的 → 出席的
at 加强 + tent 伸展 + ion 表状态 → 伸展出去〔听别人讲〕→ 注意力
at 表加强 + tent 伸展 + ive …的 → 注意的；关心的
con 共同 + tend 伸展 → 一起伸展〔个人观点〕→ 争论
dis 分散 + tend 伸展 →〔向各个方向〕分散伸展 → 扩张
ex 出 + tend 伸展 → 伸出去 → 扩张
ex 出 + tens 伸展 + ion 动作或状态 → 伸展；延期
ex 出 + tens 伸展 + ive 有…性质的 → 可四处伸展的 → 广泛的
ex 出 + tent 伸展 →〔身体〕伸展开 → 程度
in 使… + tend 伸展 → 使〔想法〕伸展 → 打算
in 不 + tens 伸展 + e → 拉到了不能再拉的地步 → 强烈的
intens〔e〕强烈的 + ify 使 → 加强
in 不 + tent 伸展 → 意图
in 不 + tent 伸展 + ion 动作或状态 → 意图
pre 前 + tend 伸展 → 向前伸手 → 假装〔乞讨〕
pre 预先 + tent 伸展 + ious …的 → 将优势伸展 → 自负的
tend 伸展 + ence 表状态 → 伸展的状态 → 趋向
tend 伸展 + ency 表状态 → 倾向
tens 伸展 + ible 可…的 → 可伸展的
tens 伸展 + ion 表名词 → 伸展到极点 → 张力
